Package test.java.warzone.entities.orders

Class OrderDetailsTest

java.lang.Object
test.java.warzone.entities.orders.OrderDetailsTest
public class OrderDetailsTest extends Object
Unit tests for OrderDetails class to ensure its properties are correctly managed. Validates the functionality of getters and setters for player name, target country, and number of armies.
Version:
2.0.0
